title: Temporal Coordinates Cipher
description: Find complete timestamps with date and time information. These precise moments are formatted with year, month, day, hour, and minute components.
solutionSummary: Uses anchors and specific ranges: \d{4} for year, (0[1-9]|1[0-2]) for months 01-12, (0[1-9]|[12][0-9]|3[01]) for days 01-31, ([01][0-9]|2[0-3]) for hours 00-23, and [0-5][0-9] for minutes 00-59. Demonstrates complex alternation and range validation.
